post.body: I already hit the 144 app limit on my iPhone. Only 5 of them are games though.
http://tinyurl.com/5633qs
great fun and good turnout! Next time. Enjoy your day!
that's a classic tweet about the auto industry! LOL thanks!
thanks! Wish you were here with us. Hope you make a return trip to NC soon.
Will miss you! Maybe next time. @jefftippett @joesumney @nshepherd @scottstead kicking things off!
Tweetup with @scottstead now at Starbucks at 55 and Highhouse http://tinyurl.com/5q77xq at 1:00 pm. Thanks!
No, they have events throughout the year. Check out: http://hatchfest.org/schedule.html Located in Bozeman, MT and Asheville, NC.
Happy Birthday! Hope you have a great day.
Good thank you. Exhausted from a 4 day conference. Nap time. :)
Good afternoon!
Yes, it smells wonderful right now. I'll take a photo and post. Sorry, no smell-o-vision features in Twitter. :)
Nice: http://www.GreenModernKits.com
Yes, at a price... 100K. The concepts are there. Detroit should focus on efficient cars for the masses.
fuel efficiency in an elegant form!
If you have Garageband, there are lots of options for ring tones with samples and loops. http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1358
Wow, sounds like an epic!
The latest beta build is buggier than heck. Last build was very stable. Too bad they force updates. Bah.
We need to get hockey going in Second Life. Maybe over the holidays! :)
Canes lead Caps by 1 after one period. Caps lead in division standings. Can't believe Maurice is back. No idea about Brind'Amour.
Kudos for raising consciousness on shark fin plunder. You may want to consider following @maratriangle in Kenya.
LIfe is too short! :)
Thanks... a bit of a pun intended.
I'll be right there with my skates on. Send me the slurl.
Didn't get any notices. Would love to sit in on a virtual hockey game. Maybe I am not on the group list?
Thank you. Trying to get two out of the way before the holidays. Rinse and repeat next week! :)
I believe that is commonly referred to as "Syncopated Synaptic Drift" http://cli.gs/qhm1BA I am experiencing the same thing! ;)
Congrats! I hope to get there soon.
Good luck! DC traffic is challenging even on normal days. My fav stat: 1 toilet per 6849 visitors. http://tinyurl.com/5motql
I agree, and so did the designer as reported in the article. Interesting progression of ideas.
Thanks. I'm looking forward to it.
Thanks! Preparing for upcoming dive trip in January.
Cool! A bit like a Reader Digest start to the day, only with more interesting content! :) http://tinyurl.com/5ubbqr
Just hearing about your power outage! Hope you are back on the grid soon. Stay warm! Good luck!
That stinks!
Happy Holidays! Ho, ho ho.
Thanks! He belongs to my son who is visiting us for the holidays.
Yes, another Photoshop hack thanks to the pen tool. Thanks!
Happy Winter Solstice!
Actually the taste is quite distinctive, a slight hint of citrus (grapefruit), but heavy on the alcohol content. Quite refreshing!
If you get the chance, another outstanding IPA that goes well with elves, my personal favorite: http://tinyurl.com/5om8wf
LOL have been secretly ordering gifts online. Had a steady FedEx and UPS stream this week. Please don't share that with anyone ;)
I'm listening. Can you explain?
Must be a slow news day since they are digging up and airing old Nixon tapes.
iPhone vs. Netbook: Which Will Be the Biggest Gaming Machine? http://cli.gs/hRYYyU

Reuters photo slideshow of Venice floods http://cli.gs/ay4v8V highest levels in 22 years.
Looks like Six Apart has enabled Pownce users a way to morph into Vox http://www.sixapart.com/pownce/
Guess the holiday is definitely over. Just received my first business call of the day at 7:12 am.
Wow, December already. Seems like only yesterday it was still November.
Thanks to everyone who came out to the spontaneous Tweetup for @scottstead Fun, interesting, and informative. Great to meet new local peeps.
Arrived at Starbucks for spontaneous tweetup with @scottstead and Triangle friends. Should be fun!
Retweeting due to bad auto-spell...
Arrived at Starbucks for spontaneous with @scottstead and Trianhle friends. Should be fun!
RTP, NC Tweetup with @scottstead from DC at 1:00 pm. Starbucks in Apex, NC. http://tinyurl.com/5q77xq NC55 & Highhouse Rd.
RTP & NC Twitterati. Meetup at 1:00 this afternoon with @scottstead from DC. Location TBD likely Starbucks in Apex. @ me or DM for details.
Just joined the HATCH network - global community of creative folks: http://hatchfest.ning.com/ and http://hatchfest.org/

Good morning! I have really enjoyed my stay in the city of Charlotte. The downtown is alive, fun, and seems to be doing well. A great town!
Oatmeal Cookies - Photo: http://bkite.com/02QWC
Mmmmm... someone special is making oatmeal cookies again. Inspired by @Meryl333 tweet for recipes last night!
10 of the Most Fuel-Efficient Cars in the United States http://cli.gs/AULySP Sweet! I am ordering a Tesla! ;)
I just joined the Twitter Group http://twittgroups.com/group/finalcutpro and you can too.
Another day with head buried in books studying for ACSA exams. May surface for air occasionally.
Checking out the new Google Earth plugin for OS X http://code.google.com/apis/earth/ Safari and Firefox.
tap tap tap - 10 useful iPhone tips & tricks: http://tinyurl.com/5nafcm
Playing hockey against @fireton in Second Life. Think we need some training.
OpenCL 1.0 spec ratified http://tinyurl.com/5gcnbc
Who Will Lead the Infrastructure 2.0 Boom? http://tinyurl.com/6gsrdl
ComScore October 2008 Data: http://tinyurl.com/5zgnf2 YouTUbe attracts 100 million video viewers in October.
Focused on ACSA studies. Two cert exams before the holidays. First one on Thursday, then again the following week on Friday. My head hurts!
One ACSA exam down, 3 more to go. Celebrating with a cold one. Cheers.
Talk about "lost in translation" - cover of the latest MaxPlanck journal: http://tinyurl.com/6j77gx
Good morning. Long day ahead. Podcast Producer presentations at MCNC in the morning, more ACSA study, then exam late afternoon.
OS X 10.5.6 and EFI firmware updates successfully applied. http://support.apple.com/kb/HT3194
Congrats to @imangi for having the number one word game in Germany! http://tinyurl.com/6bwpz3
So begins week two of my ACSA pursuit: http://training.apple.com/certification/acsa One exam down, 3 to go. Next exam on Friday! Study time!
Thinking I may simply avoid DC during the inauguration: http://tinyurl.com/5arsk5
Very cool... the Massive CD-Mastering Mind Map of @ianshepherd http://tinyurl.com/6bk79q

Ok, Twitterscope down. Neurons firing up, almost online. Study time! Have a great day!
Time to study. Need to relearn dive tables and other scuba safety details. Exam at noon, then in the water for a couple hours.
reading Wikipedia's "List of common misconceptions" http://tinyurl.com/5ubbqr
Good morning! Got up at 3:30 am, read news for an hour, then back to bed. Now feeling very rested. Scuba refresher course on today's agenda!

Just built a fire to take the edge off the cold weather. Hard to believe our forecast shows almost 70 on Monday.

What a weather switch. Yesterday's highs in the 60s, today's high in the low 30s.

My son and a chocolate lab named "Charlie" arrive home in a matter of minutes. The family holiday season is about to begin!
Back from that annual holiday tradition... Christmas shopper's traffic gridlock!
I've been putting off the inevitable... guess I should think about heading out to do some holiday shopping.
